definitions.title: adj. gent.
definitions.body: Arḳite, inhabitant of city ï Arḳa (As. Arḳa COT:Gloss. Dl:Pa 282, TelAm. Irḳat(a), Egypt. Arḳantu, cf. As. n.gent. Irḳanatai COT:Gloss, Ency. Bib.:i. 310);—only ´[[הָע]] as n.coll. Ge 10:17, to\n ) Aroukai=on, = 1Ch 1:15, A id., LXXL to\n Arakei: mod. ‘ Arḳa, near Mediterranean, c. 60 miles N. of Beirut (cf. Ency. Bib.:l. c.).
